clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in cancer tumors unspecified macular degeneration and diabetic retinopathy

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Darbepoetin alfa is combined with Endostatin
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Erythropoietin is combined with Endostatin
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Peginesatide is combined with Endostatin
The risk or severity of Thrombosis can be increased when Methoxy polyethylene glycol epoetin beta is combined with Endostatin
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Endostatin is combined with Pamidronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Endostatin is combined with Zoledronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Endostatin is combined with Alendronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Endostatin is combined with Ibandronate
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Endostatin is combined with Clodronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Endostatin is combined with Risedronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Endostatin is combined with Etidronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Endostatin is combined with Tiludronic acid
The risk or severity of jaw osteonecrosis and anti angiogenesis can be increased when Endostatin is combined with Incadronic acid
